verses.verse: The <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was in the <S%H7704>country<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2320>months.<s%>

The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H7080>diviners,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "What shall we <S%H6213>do<s%> with the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh?<s%> <S%H3045>Show<s%> us with which we shall <S%H7971>send<s%> it to its <S%H4725>place.<s%>"

They <S%H559>said,<s%> "If you send <S%H7971>away<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H7971>don't<s%> send it <S%H7387>empty;<s%> but by all <S%H7725>means<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> him a trespass <S%H817>offering:<s%> then you shall be <S%H7495>healed,<s%> and it shall be <S%H3045>known<s%> to you why his <S%H3027>hand<s%> is not removed from <S%H5493>you.<s%>"

Then they <S%H559>said,<s%> "What shall be the trespass <S%H817>offering<s%> which we shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H559>him?<s%>" They said, <S%H2568>"Five<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H2914>tumors,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5909>mice,<s%> for the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines;<s%> for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4046>plague<s%> was on you <S%H5633>all,<s%> and on your lords.

Therefore you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H6754>images<s%> of your <S%H2914>tumors,<s%> and <S%H6754>images<s%> of your <S%H5909>mice<s%> that <S%H7843>mar<s%> the <S%H776>land;<s%> and you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%> to the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> perhaps he will <S%H7043>lighten<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from off <S%H430>you,<s%> and from off your gods, and from off your <S%H776>land.<s%>

Why then do you <S%H3513>harden<s%> your <S%H3824>hearts,<s%> as the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> and <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H3513>hardened<s%> their <S%H3820>hearts?<s%> When he had worked <S%H5953>wonderfully<s%> among <S%H7971>them,<s%> didn't they let the people go, and they <S%H3212>departed?<s%>

"Now therefore <S%H3947>take<s%> and <S%H6213>prepare<s%> yourselves <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H5699>cart,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5763>milk<s%> <S%H6510>cows,<s%> on which there has <S%H5927>come<s%> no <S%H5923>yoke;<s%> and <S%H631>tie<s%> the <S%H6510>cows<s%> to the <S%H5699>cart,<s%> and <S%H7725>bring<s%> their <S%H1121>calves<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%> from <S%H310>them;<s%>

and <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H5414>lay<s%> it on the <S%H5699>cart;<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> which you <S%H7725>return<s%> him for a trespass <S%H817>offering,<s%> in a <S%H712>coffer<s%> by its <S%H6654>side;<s%> and send it <S%H7971>away,<s%> that it may <S%H1980>go.<s%>

<S%H7200>Behold;<s%> if it goes <S%H5927>up<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of its own <S%H1366>border<s%> to Beth <S%H1053>Shemesh,<s%> then he has <S%H6213>done<s%> us this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>evil:<s%> but if <S%H3045>not,<s%> then we shall know that it is not his <S%H3027>hand<s%> that <S%H5060>struck<s%> <S%H4745>us;<s%> it was a chance that happened to <S%H1961>us.<s%>"

The <S%H582>men<s%> did <S%H6213>so,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5763>milk<s%> <S%H6510>cows,<s%> and <S%H631>tied<s%> them to the <S%H5699>cart,<s%> and shut <S%H3607>up<s%> their <S%H1121>calves<s%> at <S%H1004>home;<s%>

and they <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> on the <S%H5699>cart,<s%> and the <S%H712>coffer<s%> with the <S%H5909>mice<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and the <S%H6754>images<s%> of their <S%H2914>tumors.<s%>

The <S%H6510>cows<s%> took the <S%H3474>straight<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> to Beth <S%H1053>Shemesh;<s%> they went <S%H1980>along<s%> the <S%H4546>highway,<s%> <S%H1600>lowing<s%> as they <S%H1980>went,<s%> and <S%H5493>didn't<s%> turn aside to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left;<s%> and the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of Beth <S%H1053>Shemesh.<s%>

They of Beth <S%H1053>Shemesh<s%> were <S%H7114>reaping<s%> their <S%H2406>wheat<s%> <S%H7105>harvest<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley;<s%> and they lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H727>ark,<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%> to see <S%H7200>it.<s%>

The <S%H5699>cart<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> of Beth <S%H1030>Shemesh,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H1419>there,<s%> where there was a great <S%H68>stone:<s%> and they <S%H1234>split<s%> the <S%H6086>wood<s%> of the <S%H5699>cart,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> up the <S%H6510>cows<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

The <S%H3881>Levites<s%> took <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and the <S%H712>coffer<s%> that was with <S%H3627>it,<s%> in which the jewels of <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H7760>were,<s%> and put them on the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stone:<s%> and the <S%H582>men<s%> of Beth <S%H1053>Shemesh<s%> <S%H5927>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> the same <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
When the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H7725>it,<s%> they returned to <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> the same <S%H3117>day.<s%>

These are the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H2914>tumors<s%> which the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> for a trespass <S%H817>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> for <S%H795>Ashdod<s%> <S%H259>one,<s%> for <S%H5804>Gaza<s%> <S%H259>one,<s%> for <S%H831>Ashkelon<s%> <S%H259>one,<s%> for <S%H1661>Gath<s%> <S%H259>one,<s%> for <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> <S%H259>one;<s%>

and the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5909>mice,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> belonging to the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5633>lords,<s%> both of <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> and of <S%H6521>country<s%> <S%H3724>villages,<s%> even to the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H59>stone,<s%> whereon they set <S%H3240>down<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> That stone remains to this <S%H3117>day<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> of Beth <S%H1030>Shemesh.<s%>

He <S%H5221>struck<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> of Beth <S%H1053>Shemesh,<s%> because they had <S%H7200>looked<s%> into the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> he <S%H5221>struck<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H582>men;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H56>mourned,<s%> because <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H582>people<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter.<s%>

The <S%H582>men<s%> of Beth <S%H1053>Shemesh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Who is <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> this <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H430>God?<s%> To whom shall he go up from <S%H5927>us?<s%>"

They <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of Kiriath <S%H7157>Jearim,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> have brought <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> come <S%H3381>down,<s%> and bring it up to <S%H5927>yourselves.<s%>"
